EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Knight of the Chalice: Slayer of Evil I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
You gain +1 to attack evil creatures and deal 1d6 Light damage per Imbue dice that scales with 200% Melee or Ranged Power (whichever is higher). You resist evil influences particularly well, gaining a +2 bonus to saves against spells and effects produced by evil creatures.
Mutually exclusive with Shadowguard

Stance.Name: Knight of the Chalice: Slayer of Evil
Stance.Description: You 1d6 Light damage per Imbue dice that scales with 200% Melee or Ranged Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Knight of the Chalice: Courage of Heaven
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Aura of Courage grants an additional +2 Sacred bonus to saves against Fear and now also grants a +2 Sacred bonus to saves against Enchantment. You gain +1 to hit for all attacks. +1 Imbue Dice

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Knight of the Chalice: Slayer of Evil II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Your Slayer of Evil now grants +2 to attack evil creatures and deals 2d6 Light Damage that scales with 200% Melee or ranged Power (whichever is higher). You now resist evil influences particularly well, gaining a +2 bonus to saves against spells and effects produced by evil creatures. Your weapons gain the Ghost Touch effect. +1 Imbue Dice.
In addition, you gain +4 Remove Disease charges and your Remove Disease also applies a Greater Restoration effect on your target.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Knight of the Chalice: Improved Courage of Heaven
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Your Aura of Courage grants an additional +2 Sacred bonus to saves against Fear and now also grants a +2 Sacred bonus to saves against Enchantment. You now gain +2 to hit for all attacks. +1 Imbue Dice.
You are now immune to Energy Drain.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Knight of the Chalice: Slayer of Evil III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Slayer of Evil now grants +4 to attack evil creatures and deals 5d6 Light damage that scales with 200% Melee or Ranged Power (whichever is higher). You now resist evil influences particulary well, gaining a +4 bonus to saves against spells and effects produced by evil creatures. Your Vorpal hits against undead do an additional 500 damage. +1 Imbue Dice.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Knight of the Chalice: Champion of Good
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
You gain +4 Charisma and 10 Melee and Ranged Power. The save bonuses vs. Fear and Enchantment granted by Courage of Heaven are increased by an additional +2, Any weapon you wield is considered Good Aligned for purposes of bypassing damage reduction. +1 Imbue Dice
In addition, your Aura of Courage now grants allies a +3% Sacred bonus to Melee and Ranged damage, and if you have Ascendancy your Blessed Purpose now stacks up to 25 times.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Knight of the Chalice: Holy Combatant I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to Attack and Damage with Favored Weapons.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Knight of the Chalice: Extra Smite
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +[2/4/6] additional uses of Smite Evil per rest.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Knight of the Chalice: Improved Second Strikes
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[5/10/20]% Strikethrough

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Knight of the Chalice: Shieldbeaker
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] to Sunder DCs.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Knight of the Chalice: Knight's Authority
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] to Intimidate, Diplomacy and Concentration. Rank 3: +1 Fortitude Save.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Knight of the Chalice: Adept Combatant
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to Attack and Damage with all weapons. You gain Long Sword, Battle Axe, Heavy Mace, Morningstar and War Hammer as Favored Weapons.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Knight of the Chalice: Divine Might
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Battle Trance: You gain an Insight bonus to Attack, Damage, and the DC of tactical feats equal to 1/2 of your Charisma modifier for [30/60/120] seconds. Antirequisite: This ability can not be trained if you have any other Battle Trance abilities. Spell Point Cost: 21/18/15 Cooldown: 20 seconds

Stance.Name: Divine Might
Stance.Description: You gain an Insight bonus to Attack, Damage, and the DC of tactical feats equal to 1/2 of your Charisma modifier for [30/60/120] seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Avenging Shot
EnhancementSelection.Description: Take a powerful shot for +3[W] damage. Shares a cooldown with the Cleave feat. Cooldown: 5 seconds

EnhancementSelection.Name: Exalted Cleave
EnhancementSelection.Description: Make a sweeping attack against all nearby enemies for +3[W] damage. Shares a cooldown with the Cleave feat. Cooldown: 5 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Knight of the Chalice: Holy Combatant II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +2 to Attack and Damage with Favored Weapons. You gain Greatsword as a Favored Weapon.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Knight of the Chalice: Divine Sacrifice
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select a Melee or Ranged Attack.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Divine Sacrifice
EnhancementSelection.Description: Giving up some of your life force to win the battle, you empower your next blow against your foe. This attack increases the critical multiplier of your weapon by 1 and deals an additional 5d6 Light damage, but costs you 5 HP and 1 SP, whether or not the attack is successful.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Divine Sacrifice (Ranged)
EnhancementSelection.Description: Giving up some of your life force to win the battle, you empower your next blow against your foe. This attack increases the critical multiplier of your weapon by 1 and deals an additional 5d6 Light damage, but costs you 5 HP and 1 SP, whether or not the attack is successful.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Knight of the Chalice: Lead the Charge
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Melee Rush Attack: Rush forward up to 30 feet to your selected opponent and deliver a +[2/3/5][W] strike. 12 second cooldown. Shares a cooldown with Shield Charge,

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Knight of the Chalice: Exalted Smite
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Slect a Melee or Ranged Smite.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Exalted Smite
EnhancementSelection.Description: Active: An improved smite that adds +1/+1/+2 to your weapon's critical damage multiplier. Smite Evil: Using this attack, you call on the paladin's ability to strike down evil creatures, gaining twice your Charisma bonus to your attack roll, and a damage bonus based on your paladin level. Smites return at a rate of one every 90 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Exalted Smite (Ranged)
EnhancementSelection.Description: Active: An improved smite that adds +1/+1/+2 to your weapon's critical damage multiplier. Smite Evil: Using this attack, you call on the paladin's ability to strike down evil creatures, gaining twice your Charisma bonus to your attack roll, and a damage bonus based on your paladin level. Smites return at a rate of one every 90 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Charisma or Strength

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Knight of the Chalice: Knight's Training
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to Attack and Damage with all weapons and +1 to Attack and Damage with Favored Weapons. You also gain the Knight's Training feat and the Shot on the Run feat: When wielding one of the following weapons, you are granted the following: Longswords you wield have a +1 Morale bonus to Critical Multiplier Battle Axes you wield have a +1 Morale bonus to Critical Threat Range, increasing to +2 Morale bonus if you have Improved Critical: Slashing Heavy Maces, Warhammers, and Morningstars you wield have a +1 Morale bonus to Critical Threat Range.

EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +30 Positive Healing Amplification -30 Negative Healing Amplification.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Knight of the Chalice: Improved Turning
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You count as [1/2/3] level higher when turning undead and add [2/4/6] to the number of hit dice turned and gain +[1/2/3] uses of Turn Undead per rest.Your Turn Undead ability now also deals [6/12/18]d6 light damage to nearby undead which scales with 200% of the higher of melee or ranged power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Knight of the Chalice: Ability II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Charisma or Strength

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Knight of the Chalice: Ascendancy
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
+2 to Attack and Damage with all weapons. An additional +2 to Attack and Damage with Favored Weapons. You gain 15% Fotification Bypass.
Whenever you attack an Undead or Evil Outsider with a Favored Weapon, you gain a stack of Blessed Purpose: +3 Sacred Bonus to Melee and Ranged Power that lasts for 6 seconds. You can acquire up to 15 stacks of this by continuing to attack Undead or Evil Outsiders. Switching to a non-Favored Weapon will reset your stacks of Blessed Purpose.

EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Censure Demons ability now applies to all Chaotic or Evil outsiders. You also gain 10 Melee and Ranged Power.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Avenging Cleave
EnhancementSelection.Description: Make a sweeping weapon attack against all nearby enemies for +5[W] damage. Damaged enemies gains one stack of Vulnerability. Shares its cooldown with the Great Cleave feat. Vulnerability: You take 1% more damage for 3 seconds. This effect stacks up to 20 times, and loses one stack on expiration.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Avenging Shot
EnhancementSelection.Description: Take a sweeping weapon attack against all nearby enemies for +5[W] damage. Damaged enemies gains one stack of Vulnerability. Shares its cooldown with the Great Cleave feat. Vulnerability: You take 1% more damage for 3 seconds. This effect stacks up to 20 times, and loses one stack on expiration.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Knight of the Chalice: Holy Retribution
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose a Melee or Ranged Attack

EnhancementSelection.Name: Holy Retribution
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Melee Channel Divinity: Executes a powerful holy cleave against nearby targets that deals +5[W] damage, 100 extra holy damage that scales with 200% Melee or Ranged Power, -6 to all ability scores for 10 seconds, and recharges one Smite Evil charge to you. On Damage: Evil creatures may be forced to make a Will save (DC 10 + Paladin Level + Charisma Mod + Sunder Bonuses) or be destroyed.
Evil creatures with under 1000 HP must always make this save or die. Evil creatures with between 5000 and 1000 HP have a 50% chance to be forced to make this save or die. Evil creatures with more than 5000 have a 33% chance to be forced to make this save or die.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Holy Retribution Shot
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Ranged Channel Divinity: Executes a powerful holy cleave against nearby targets that deals +5[W] damage, 100 extra holy damage that scales with 200% Melee or Ranged Power, -6 to all ability scores for 10 seconds, and recharges one Smite Evil charge to you. On Damage: Evil creatures may be forced to make a Will save (DC 10 + Paladin Level + Charisma Mod + Sunder Bonuses) or be destroyed.
Evil creatures with under 1000 HP must always make this save or die. Evil creatures with between 5000 and 1000 HP have a 50% chance to be forced to make this save or die. Evil creatures with more than 5000 have a 33% chance to be forced to make this save or die.
